Used graduate admissions dataset to predict the chances of admission of the student.

The dataset contains several parameters which are considered important during the application for Masters Programs. The parameters included are :

GRE Scores ( out of 340 )
TOEFL Scores ( out of 120 )
University Rating ( out of 5 )
Statement of Purpose and Letter of Recommendation Strength ( out of 5 )
Undergraduate GPA ( out of 10 )
Research Experience ( either 0 or 1 )
Chance of Admit ( ranging from 0 to 1 )

Dataset: https://www.kaggle.com/mohansacharya/graduate-admissions/home

VISUALIZATION 

Visualized the dataset using scatter_matrix function of pandas library which shows the plot of each attribute with every other attribute.From this we can find out the factors which have linear relationship with chances of admission.

In this case it can be observed that-
GRE score
TOEFL score
CGPA
Have linear relation with chances of admission. It means our prediction will be largely dependent on their values as compared to other attributes.
